mapper.select: select * from egg_production_record where record_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}

select epr.egg_production_record_id, epr.batch_id, epr.egg_production_amount, epr.egg_production_rate, epr.bad_egg_production_amount, epr.bad_egg_production_rate, epr.pick_egg_person, epr.record_person, epr.record_time, epr.gmt_create, epr.gmt_modified, bi.batch_name, ubi.name as recordPersonName, ubi2.name as eggPickPersonName from egg_production_record epr join batch_info bi on epr.batch_id = bi.batch_id join user_basic_info ubi on epr.record_person = ubi.user_basic_info_id join user_basic_info ubi2 on epr.pick_egg_person = ubi2.user_basic_info_id;
